$comment: This schema describes KM import/export with KM metamodel 10

stringMap.title: String Map
stringMap.description: Representation of simple map where both keys and values are strings

desirabilityPhase.title: Desirability Phase
desirabilityPhase.description: Indicates if a question is desirable in certain phase of a project

id.title: Package ID
id.description: Unique composed ID for a package

metricMeasure.title: Metric Measure
metricMeasure.description: Entity capturing how certain metric is affected

packageBundle.title: Package Bundle (object)
packageBundle.description: Collection of potentially multiple linked Knowledge Model packages that is commonly used for import and export in DSW.

package.title: Package
package.description: A single KM package that holds changes (or more precisely events) for the specific version.

event.title: Event
event.description: An event represents a single change in a KM. There are events for each entity type and usually three types of changes: **Add**, **Edit**, and **Delete**. In some cases, also **Move** event is possible.

AddKnowledgeModelEvent.title: Add Knowledge Model Event
AddKnowledgeModelEvent.description: Add a new Knowledge Model (typically only once and the very first event) as the top-level entity

EditKnowledgeModelEvent.title: Edit Knowledge Model Event
EditKnowledgeModelEvent.description: Edit properties of the top-level entity

AddChapterEvent.title: Add Chapter Event
AddChapterEvent.description: Add a new chapter to the KM

EditChapterEvent.title: Edit Chapter Event
EditChapterEvent.description: Edit an existing chapter in the KM

DeleteChapterEvent.title: Delete Chapter Event
DeleteChapterEvent.description: Delete an existing chapter from the KM

AddOptionsQuestionEvent.title: Add Options Question Event
AddOptionsQuestionEvent.description: Add a new options question to the KM

AddListQuestionEvent.title: Add List Question Event
AddListQuestionEvent.description: Add a new list question to the KM

AddValueQuestionEvent.title: Add Value Question Event
AddValueQuestionEvent.description: Add a new value question to the KM

AddIntegrationQuestionEvent.title: Add Integration Question Event
AddIntegrationQuestionEvent.description: Add a new integration question to the KM

AddMultiChoiceQuestionEvent.title: Add Multi-Choice Question Event
AddMultiChoiceQuestionEvent.description: Add a new multi-choice question to the KM

EditOptionsQuestionEvent.title: Edit Options Question Event
EditOptionsQuestionEvent.description: Edit an existing options question in the KM

EditListQuestionEvent.title: Edit List Question Event
EditListQuestionEvent.description: Edit an existing list question in the KM

EditValueQuestionEvent.title: Edit Value Question Event
EditValueQuestionEvent.description: Edit an existing value question in the KM

EditIntegrationQuestionEvent.title: Edit Integration Question Event
EditIntegrationQuestionEvent.description: Edit an existing integration question in the KM

EditMultiChoiceQuestionEvent.title: Edit Multi-Choice Question Event
EditMultiChoiceQuestionEvent.description: Edit an existing multi-choice question in the KM

DeleteQuestionEvent.title: Delete Question Event
DeleteQuestionEvent.description: Delete an existing question from the KM

AddAnswerEvent.title: Add Answer Event
AddAnswerEvent.description: Add a new answer to the KM

EditAnswerEvent.title: Edit Answer Event
EditAnswerEvent.description: Edit an existing answer in the KM

DeleteAnswerEvent.title: Delete Answer Event
DeleteAnswerEvent.description: Delete an existing answer from the KM

AddExpertEvent.title: Add Expert Event
AddExpertEvent.description: Add a new expert to the KM

EditExpertEvent.title: Edit Expert Event
EditExpertEvent.description: Edit an existing expert in the KM

DeleteExpertEvent.title: Delete Expert Event
DeleteExpertEvent.description: Delete an existing expert from the KM

AddResourcePageReferenceEvent.title: Add Resource Page Reference Event
AddResourcePageReferenceEvent.description: Add a new resource page reference to the KM

AddURLReferenceEvent.title: Add URL Reference Event
AddURLReferenceEvent.description: Add a new URL reference to the KM

AddCrossReferenceEvent.title: Add Cross-Reference Event
AddCrossReferenceEvent.description: Add a new cross-reference to the KM

EditResourcePageReferenceEvent.title: Edit Resource Page Reference Event
EditResourcePageReferenceEvent.description: Edit an existing resource page reference in the KM

EditURLReferenceEvent.title: Edit URL Reference Event
EditURLReferenceEvent.description: Edit an existing URL reference in the KM

EditCrossReferenceEvent.title: Edit Cross-Reference Event
EditCrossReferenceEvent.description: Edit an existing cross-reference in the KM

DeleteReferenceEvent.title: Delete Reference Event
DeleteReferenceEvent.description: Delete an existing reference from the KM

AddTagEvent.title: Add Tag Event
AddTagEvent.description: Add a new tag to the KM

EditTagEvent.title: Edit Tag Event
EditTagEvent.description: Edit an existing tag in the KM

DeleteTagEvent.title: Delete Tag Event
DeleteTagEvent.description: Delete an existing tag from the KM

AddIntegrationEvent.title: Add Integration Event
AddIntegrationEvent.description: Add a new integration to the KM

DeleteIntegrationEvent.title: Delete Integration Event
DeleteIntegrationEvent.description: Delete an existing integration from the KM

MoveQuestionEvent.title: Move Question Event
MoveQuestionEvent.description: Move an existing question to a different location in the KM

MoveAnswerEvent.title: Move Answer Event
MoveAnswerEvent.description: Move an existing answer to a different location in the KM

MoveExpertEvent.title: Move Expert Event
MoveExpertEvent.description: Move an existing expert to a different location in the KM

MoveReferenceEvent.title: Move Reference Event
MoveReferenceEvent.description: Move an existing reference to a different location in the KM

AddChoiceEvent.title: Add Choice Event
AddChoiceEvent.description: Add a new choice to the KM

EditChoiceEvent.title: Edit Choice Event
EditChoiceEvent.description: Edit an existing choice in the KM

DeleteChoiceEvent.title: Delete Choice Event
DeleteChoiceEvent.description: Delete an existing choice from the KM

AddPhaseEvent.title: Add Phase Event
AddPhaseEvent.description: Add a new phase to the KM

EditPhaseEvent.title: Edit Phase Event
EditPhaseEvent.description: Edit an existing phase in the KM

DeletePhaseEvent.title: Delete Phase Event
DeletePhaseEvent.description: Delete an existing phase from the KM

AddMetricEvent.title: Add Metric Event
AddMetricEvent.description: Add a new metric to the KM

EditMetricEvent.title: Edit Metric Event
EditMetricEvent.description: Edit an existing metric in the KM

DeleteMetricEvent.title: Delete Metric Event
DeleteMetricEvent.description: Delete an existing metric from the KM

title: Package Bundle
description: The JSON representation used for import and export of KMs uses packages (event containers) bundled in a single object.
